title: Take A Look Inside Paul Pogba's Incredible £3 Million Mansion
text:
Take A Look Inside Paul Pogba's Incredible £3 Million Mansion Tue Feb 07 2017 11:32:48   11:32:48 GMT+0000 (GMT) Nasir Jabbar Nasir Jabbar in football 
After he completed his whopping £89 million transfer back to Manchester United, Paul Pogba had been calling the Lowry hotel home until now. The United star has forked out a cool £3 million for this state-of-the-art mansion in Cheshire. 
Pogba has snapped up this unreal property which includes five bedrooms, a leisure suite, heated pool, sauna, lounge room and a bunch of other rooms all fitted in a modern and stylish design. 
Time to gawk. Check out the images below via the Manchester Evening News ; from the drive to the stunning indoor swimming pool: 
Outside view of the house. 
A large driveway fitted with a garage. Space for all his cars. 
The bathroom. 
One of the many lounges. 
A mansion can't be complete without a games room. 
Huge kitchen with a massive worktop. 
One of FIVE bedrooms. 
The property has a very slick design throughout the mansion. 
Another lounge room. 
And another bedroom. 
Dining room. 
It's believed he paid a massive £600,000 below the asking price while the mansion apparently used to house ex-United striker Javier Hernandez and his sister during his tenure at Old Trafford. 
Not only is it a banging mansion but it's also reportedly located just a short drive away from the clubs training complex in Carrington. So no excuses for being late, Paul. Sponsored Links
